svcsubproc.title: Fire Extinguisher
svcsubproc.para: The fire extinguisher is a recommended item on all buses ( Figure 49, Item 4). Placement of the extinguisher may vary depending on the specification requirements of the state or local municipality. The extinguisher should be checked monthly to ensure that it has sufficient charge. Look at the gauge located at the top of the extinguisher to verify proper charge.

step1.para: The extinguisher mounting bracket is generally mounted on a vertical flat surface and attached with two screws. Some extinguishers are also equipped with a base plate and vertical mounting bracket.
Remove the extinguisher from the mounting bracket, locate, loosen and remove the mounting screws.
